mapper.select:
-- findMaxFilledOrder
SELECT ORDER_ID , EXCHANGE_ORDER_ID , BATTER_EXECUTION_ID , ORDER_SYMBOL , ORDER_POSITION_CD , ORDER_TYPE_CD , ORDER_DT , ORDER_DTTM , ORDER_PRICE , ORDER_QUANTITY , ORDER_STATUS_CD , TRANSACTION_DT , TRANSACTION_DTTM , TRANSACTION_PRICE , TRANSACTION_QUANTITY , TRANSACTION_TOTAL_AMOUNT , COMMISSION FROM TB_BATTER_ORDER WHERE ORDER_ID = ( SELECT MAX(ORDER_ID) FROM TB_BATTER_ORDER WHERE BATTER_EXECUTION_ID = "1" AND ORDER_STATUS_CD = "FILLED" )
